Directions: Read this passage, then answer each question that follows.
Context: Read a page from the school's newsletter about the events happening at Marcos and Lupe's school.
Title: Passage 2
Content: Uᴘᴄᴏᴍɪɴɢ Eᴠᴇɴᴛs Tʜɪs Fᴀʟʟ: Fᴜɴ ꜰᴏʀ Sᴛᴜᴅᴇɴᴛs!
